content: first published in knit today in 2011 i have updated the pattern into my current format my free knitted christmas trees pattern is a quick and easy make that uses up small scraps of yarn from your stash each little tree is knitted in garter stitch with yarn held double then finished with a neat knitted trunk double knitting yarn light worsted weight is held together to create a firm thickness similar to a light bulky chunky yarn us 7 4 5mm straight knitting needles are used to work flat in row starting from the bottom of the tree and working up alternatively - you can make smaller individual trees for gift-wrapping using yarn single and 3 25mm needles simple decreasing shapes the tree k2tog the trunk can either be knitted on by picking up stitches or knitted separately and sewn on both options are included
